word_mean: 倾斜，斜度，坡度：偏离水平或垂直方向的倾斜
牙偏斜：牙的长轴斜离垂直线
牙面偏斜：牙面的某一部分偏离通常的平面
倾角：指牙腔壁与牙面的倾角，或与对侧壁相互的角度，如腔壁向内倾斜(inward inclination)和向外倾斜(outward inclination)等
釉质柱对牙面垂直线的斜度

sentence.Network_en: Their inclination to wait and demand more resources desolated President Lincoln.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们总是等待并要求得到更多资财的倾向让林肯总统甚感不快。

sentence.Network_en: He did not show the slightest inclination to leave.
sentence.Network_cn: 他丝毫没有表现出要离开的意思。

sentence.Network_en: He is a teacher by occupation but a philosopher by inclination.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的职业是教师,但他的本心是成为哲学家.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin inclinatio(n-), from inclinare 'bend towards' (see incline)

entry.def: An inclination is a feeling that makes you want to act in a particular way.

example.ex: He had neither the time nor the inclination to think of other things...
example.tran: 他没有时间也不愿意去考虑其他事情。

example.ex: She showed no inclination to go...
example.tran: 她丝毫没有要走的意思。

means.word_mean: 1. an attitude of mind especially one that favors one alternative over others;

sentences.sentence: "he had an inclination to give up too easily"

means.word_mean: 2. (astronomy) the angle between the plane of the orbit and the plane of the ecliptic stated in degrees
3. (geometry) the angle formed by the x-axis and a given line (measured counterclockwise from the positive half of the x-axis)
4. (physics) the angle that a magnetic needle makes with the plane of the horizon
5. that toward which you are inclined to feel a liking;
6. the property possessed by a line or surface that departs from the vertical;

sentences.sentence: "the ship developed a list to starboard"
"he walked with a heavy inclination to the right"

means.word_mean: 7. a characteristic likelihood of or natural disposition toward a certain condition or character or effect;

sentences.sentence: "the alkaline inclination of the local waters"

means.word_mean: 8. the act of inclining; bending forward;

sentences.sentence: "an inclination of his head indicated his agreement"

auth_sentence.content: I just knew I lacked the ideas or inclination.
auth_sentence.res_content: I just knew I lacked the ideas or inclination.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I just knew I lacked the ideas or inclination.

auth_sentence.content: The inclination now is more toward emphatic self-promotion.
auth_sentence.res_content: The inclination now is more toward emphatic self-promotion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The inclination now is more toward emphatic self-promotion.

auth_sentence.content: Neither had any known previous inclination toward terrorism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Neither had any known previous inclination toward terrorism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Neither had any known previous inclination toward terrorism.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿

means.word_mean: 爱好, 癖好, 意向
倾向, 趋向, 趋势

sentences.en: I did not feel the slightest inclination to hurry.
sentences.cn: 我没有丝毫着急的意思。

sentences.en: I have neither the time nor the inclination to play stupid games!
sentences.cn: 玩愚蠢的游戏，我既没有时间也没有兴趣！

sentences.en: He had shown an inclination, from the first, to go his own way.
sentences.cn: 他一开始就表现出我行我素的倾向。

sentences.en: He is a teacher by occupation but a philosopher by inclination.
sentences.cn: 他的职业是教师，但他的本心是成为哲学家。

means.word_mean: 倾斜, 弯腰, 曲身, 点头

sentences.en: She greeted us with a slight inclination of the head.
sentences.cn: 她微微点头向我们致意。

sentences.en: There’s a small inclination beyond the trees.
sentences.cn: 树林那边有一个小斜坡。
